comment: Clairol Nice 'n Easy stock will take a plunge if Ruth retires. She is on life support already and if No-name McCain can work with half a brain I guess Ruth can. LMAO
amr:
# ::snt Clairol Nice 'n Easy stock will take a plunge if Ruth retires. She is on life support already and if No-name McCain can work with half a brain I guess Ruth can. LMAO
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / plunge-01
            :ARG1 (s / stock
                  :ARG1-of (n / nice-01)
                  :mod (e / easy)
                  :mod (c / company
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Clairol")))
            :condition (r / retire-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Ruth"))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s2 / support-01
                  :ARG1 (s3 / she)
                  :mod (l / life)
                  :time (a2 / already))
            :op2 (g / guess-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (c2 / capable-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / person
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "McCain")
                              :ARG1-of (n5 / name-01
                                    :polarity -))
                        :ARG2 (w / work-01
                              :ARG0 p3
                              :manner (b / brain
                                    :quant "1/2")))
                  :condition (p4 / possible-01
                        :ARG1 w)))
      :snt3 (l2 / laugh-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG0 ii)
      :manner (l3 / loud))
